gasContract.terms: Please visit www.lumoenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer.
gasContract.variation: We may vary our rates no more than once per 6 months. We will publish any variation in a newspaper and on our website at least 10 business days before it starts. We also notify you of the variation by no later than your next bill.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Australian Gas Network Bairnsdale distribution zone. For more information contact 1300 115 866.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
